src:
Inglaterra
Machester, con el Kun, recibe a Southampton

02 Nov 2019, 00:08

Manchester City, con el goleador Sergio Agüero, recibirá hoy a Southampton en uno de los ocho partidos correspondientes a la fecha 11 de la liga inglesa de fútbol que se jugará en el estadio Etihad y comenzará a las 12, hora argentina.El resto de los partidos son:9.30: Bournemouth-Manchester United (Sergio Romero y Marcos Rojo).12.00: Arsenal (Emiliano Martínez)-Wolverhampton; Aston Villa-Liverpool; Brighton And Hove-Norwich City; Sheffield United-Burnley; West Ham (Manuel Lanzini y Pablo Zabaleta)-Newcastle (Federico Fernández); Watford (Roberto Pereyra)-Chelsea.
text:
England
Machester, with Kun, receives Southampton

02 Nov 2019, 00:08

Manchester City, with the scorer Sergio Agüero, will receive Southampton today in one of the eight matches corresponding to date 11 of the English football league that will be played at Etihad Stadium and will begin at 12, Argentine time. matches are: 9.30: Bournemouth-Manchester United (Sergio Romero and Marcos Rojo) .12.00: Arsenal (Emiliano Martínez) -Wolverhampton; Aston Villa-Liverpool; Brighton And Hove-Norwich City; Sheffield United-Burnley; West Ham (Manuel Lanzini and Pablo Zabaleta) -Newcastle (Federico Fernández); Watford (Roberto Pereyra) -Chelsea.
